topFold.joinTitle: Join the fight to stop COVID
topFold.details:
We welcome passionate individuals of all backgrounds and experience to help us in ending COVID-19.

Whether you’re a humanitarian, expert or simply eager to make an impact, there’s a multitude of ways to get involved with Virufy’s mission.

donate.title: Make a donation
donate.details:
Donate now to help Virufy perform its vital work of bringing fast and free disease diagnosis to all.

Every bit helps — we couldn’t do it without the financial support of contributors like you.

shareCough.title: Share your cough
shareCough.details:
We welcome cough “donations” to help expand our database and refine our AI’s predictive ability to recognize COVID-19.

All that’s needed is a mobile device, the Virufy app and your cough.
shareCough.irbDisclaimer: All data is collected in compliance with IRB protocol.

contribute.title: Contribute your expertise
contribute.details: We work with science, medical, technology and other expert professionals across the globe to shape and accomplish Virufy’s mission.
contribute.question: Looking to get involved?

join.title: Join the Virufighter team
join.details: We’re a youth-led organization that fosters a positive learning environment with a worldwide impact. Our volunteers span more than 15 countries, each contributing their unique perspectives.
join.question: Excited to help out?
